function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased indoor time for higher-income households during the pandemic","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission due to prolonged indoor exposure","Mitigation":"Encourage ventilation, promote outdoor activities, and implement stricter hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and UV disinfection","People":"Higher-income household members, especially those working remotely","Owner":"Building management, employers, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Shifts in load profiles for different income groups","Impact":"Variability in load profiles may indicate different levels of pandemic impact and risk exposure","Mitigation":"Further investigation, targeted interventions for high-risk groups, and monitoring of load patterns","Technologies":"Data analytics, load monitoring systems, and targeted outreach strategies","People":"Members of different income groups, especially those with significant load profile changes","Owner":"Energy providers, public health agencies, and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on schedules and work requirements for different income groups","Impact":"Differential impact on schedules may affect risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Flexible work arrangements, support for essential workers, and targeted health interventions","Technologies":"Telecommuting technology, scheduling software, and health monitoring systems","People":"Workers in different income groups, with a focus on essential workers","Owner":"Employers, government agencies, and public health organizations"}]}
